DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim of this study is to investigate if AZD1386 is efficacious as an analgesic in patients with peripheral neuropathic pain. This will be done by comparing the effect of AZD1386 to placebo ("inactive substance") on pain.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Efficacy, Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of AZD1386 in Patients With Peripheral Neuropathic Pain
DOC.criteria: Patients with painful symptoms due to neuropathic pain Provision of signed informed consent Non pregnant females Other pain conditions that may confound assessment of neuropathic pain, as judged by the investigator History, and/or presence of somatic disease, which may interfere with the objectives of the study as judged by the investigator
